channel.title: [474]Run Error[474]
channel.description:
Ok, So when I try to Run this Source I downloaded, I got this.
[CODE]May 31, 2010 8:26:59 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... May 31, 2010 8:26:59 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... May 31, 2010 8:27:00 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... May 31, 2010 8:27:00 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... May 31, 2010 8:27:00 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready May 31, 2010 8:27:01 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... May 31, 2010 8:27:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. May 31, 2010 8:27:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... May 31, 2010 8:27:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... May 31, 2010 8:27:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... May 31, 2010 8:27:03 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]
Please Help

item.title: [474]Run Error[474]
item.dc:creator: @teh_michaelz teh michaelz
item.description:

Ok, So when I try to Run this Source I downloaded, I got this.
